description: yeehaa is a seasoned professional with robust experience across industries including technology and consulting. With strong backgrounds in software engineering and project management, yeehaa has driven significant upgrades and implementations. An alumnus of top-tier institutions, yeehaa combines academic insights with practical expertise to foster innovation and efficiency. They wrote 'Across Space And Time' on modern ecosystems and curated the course 'Groom Your Ecosystem,' emphasizing strategic vision and multidisciplinary skills.
blurb: Biological ecosystems are defined by space and time, but modern ecosystems transcend these. Ecosystem architecture proposes decentralized, non-hierarchical structures inspired by diverse disciplines.
